website_summaries.verdict: Designed just for women, this razor has been created to contour tricky areas better, like knees and ankles.
pros: 5 blades individually adjust to every curve of the body
Water-activated MoistureGlide serum to help the razor glide along with ease
Any Venus cartridge fits with any Venus handle
Comfortable grip handles and pivoting heads that contour to curves
Help legs feel smooth after use
Comes with two razor blade refills

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tremors!
customer_reviews.text: I have epilepsy it's very hard to shave. I also have bad anxiety so I tremble as I'm trying to not to cut myself. I take breaks and or sit down because I partial seize sometimes and can't control my hand. Usually pressing the razor down hard against my skin with tight grip and can't move my hand. Or my hands shaking so much I'm terrified to attempt it and can't hold it straight. I've sliced off chunks of skin with other razors because they're not flexible like these. Thank you!! You don't know how much this helps!
customer_reviews.author: ICH8RS

customer_reviews.title: It will do I guess
customer_reviews.text: razors are nice but I really don't like the strip of lotion/soap, what ever it is, that is supposed to make this glide over your skin. It just gets gooey and sticky after its been wet...don't set it on anything it will get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I like that it pivots to help get to difficult areas ...
customer_reviews.text: A well made razor. I like that it pivots to help get to difficult areas that usually get cut with a straight personal razor. I also really like the design, color and the comfort strips. I'm happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Petit Trianon

customer_reviews.title: I guess the swivel head makes it better although I don't really notice the difference
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old razor head. They haven't changed much. I guess the swivel head makes it better although I don't really notice the difference. But since I've used this product for years, I have to say it's a really comfortable shave. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Good razors
customer_reviews.text: Been using these razors for about two years now and I love them. I have super sensitive skin on my legs but hair that grows like there's no tomorrow and these razors are some of the only ones I've found that do a decent shave job but don't slice me up. I used one handle for two years before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Cahoon

customer_reviews.title: Just eh, good for some, not for me
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the reviews I decided to get this razor thinking that it would wow me more than my executive razor from Dollar Shave Club... but it didn't and I'll be sticking to my executive razor. My main issue with this razor is the purple soap ring around the blades, it will slick down my hairs the point where the blades can't shave them and that gets a bit frustrating especially since I don't want to sit in the tub all day trying to shave. My executive razor still comes out on top and won't be replaced anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of this razor. I have thick corse hair and I get ingrown hairs on my legs a lot and cuts all the time with pretty much any razor I use. Since trying this out, I’m super impressed, and don’t have as much of a problem anymore with all the above
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Failed to wow
customer_reviews.text: Stocking stuffers that everyone was excited to try but the consensus was...meh. At this price, I won't be buying into the "more blades are better" idea and the other design improvements just fail to wow. For an optimized shave experience, my group gets the most from using a badger brush and shave cream and a razor strop to keep razors honed.
customer_reviews.author: jamb

customer_reviews.title: eh good
customer_reviews.text: the swirl thing its not really that big of a deal like to me it works the same as a regular razor, but the razor itself was very good and left my legs smooth and it lasted for a pretty good while so i’d say its still a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best razor ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Gillette Venus Extra Smooth Swirl Women's Razor is the best I've ever used! I am especially appreciative of it's handle design as it facilitates ease of use for my very arthritic hands! The head design is such that I am confident I will not swerve and cut myself especially in the awkward angled areas of the leg, i.e. knee, back of knee, back of ankle, etc.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: As Close to Waxing w/o the Cost +Tip
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY SHARP, CLOSE shave! ;) Smoothest my legs ever been next to a good wax job. Ladies, it feels like the Gillette Fusion that your man uses. It does not have a gel type bar. It has a rubber/silicone bar which means it will not slip. Hence the warning. Plus, it is a very pretty, sleek design. I will purchase the Olay shaving gel next time it will probably make it the ABSOLUTE perfect shave.
customer_reviews.author: Kahlyssa

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: This handle is a great color and is comfortable and not slippery in hand. This is the second time I have bought this razor handle only to have it snap in half while in use. This time it broke after less than 5 months of light to moderate use and the previous one did not last much longer. Prior to switching to the Venus 5 blade I used the Mach 3. That handle was was at least 15 years old when it started to wear out. I will try a different style of Venus handle and hope it’s not a piece of junk like this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Shaves close and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I've avoided more than three blades before now because of razor burn horror stories but I'm very happy with the job this blade does. My skin is so smooth after one glide of the razor. I got two: one for traveling and one for home to cut down on throwing whole razors away. Now I only need to buy the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: No grip on razor...too slippery!
customer_reviews.text: The handle is so smooth and slippery it's impossible to shave! The blade feels ok but don't waste your $ on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Wildberry

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: I'm still looking for that razor that mimics my husband's smooth shave. This is a close contender. I really like the swivel head which reminds me of my Dyson. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thatgirl

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice, doesn’t shave too well though.
customer_reviews.text: This razor glides across the skin like butter, however, I find that it takes 4, 5, or even 6 passes on a section to get all the hair off. I used another razor before this one from a different brand and had been using the same one for months and it shaved better than this razor even after it was totally dull.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Gilfillan

customer_reviews.title: Good hold
customer_reviews.text: I wish they still sold these with the extramoisturizing refills
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but worth the extra money for a much better shave than most razors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it easy to use shaves really good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. It gets the hair off really well.I bought one for my mom who had a stoke will review again once she uses it but this is my second one just replacing mine because it was old love this razor!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: gives razor burns on under arms
customer_reviews.text: terrible razor burns on underarm area, works for legs well...I would not purchase this product again...read reviews first and was going by that
customer_reviews.author: JayDee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy to try out their newest razor
customer_reviews.text: A good buy to see if you like it or as a spare for travel. The new purple swivel handle and 2 blades. When I purchased, it was less expensive here than Local Target, Walgreens, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Only type of razor the wife uses!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them. We should take out stock in this type of razor. This is the only type she likes, and they come with 2 additional replacements blades. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: BearDownChi1

customer_reviews.title: I totally enjoy this razor
customer_reviews.text: It fits steady and is totally easy to use. Could hardly been any better. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Arrow

customer_reviews.title: A nice comfortable razor
customer_reviews.text: HAve't used this style before and am pleased with it's performance. Haven't cut myself yet.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Rohats

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic grip
customer_reviews.text: Very flexible razor head and ergonomic grip. Tried it out with a new Cremo shaving cream and loved the results! Smooth skin with less black dots and no razor burns or cuts. We’ll see how long each razor head lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Good price--Awkward product design
customer_reviews.text: Decently priced product. The curve of the handle makes it awkward to hold, and I'm not sure what the whole swivel thing is about. Other than that, it functions as a regular razor, and Gillette's blades are among the best!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Love this razor.  Easy shaving legs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor. Good on leg curves. It's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: ***Easy to use, nice razor***
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much! Does the job, arrived quickly and is comfortable to hold and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughter, she loves it. I thought it was pricey
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Razor
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable handle fits great in a women's hands. Some others are either too thin and slip or to bulky. The large swivel head allows a smooth and easy shave. The only reason I have the 2 stars for travel is the moisture strip could get messy in your bag. Just pack it a ziplock to avoid that.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Cut myself shaving with it very easy Not happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Graham

customer_reviews.title: Wearing shorts like a big girl.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a great razor for a while now and I think I've fallen in love. I have very sensitive skin so I usually break out really badly after shaving; and it probably doesn't help that my hair is so thick that I can dull a razor in a single stroke. So, needless to say, I needed something durable as well as gentle. I saw this and thought it was the best value for my buck (even though I was a bit skeptical about it). I am very happy with this purchase. I don't see myself buying cheap disposable's anytime in the future. I'd rather just look like a woolly mammoth.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Starke

customer_reviews.title: Just didn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the roller ball, but something about this razor just didn’t work. I was left with so much stubble it was as if I hadn’t shaved at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Grauer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and I’m a sucker for purple
customer_reviews.text: It’s similar to other Venus razors and I did not notice much difference with the pivot portion. I’ve been using Venus for 15 years and got this one because it was purple and pretty. I know that’s a silly reason to choose a razor, oh well at least it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Smooth, safe, shave for your delicate areas. Great bikini trim.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: I LOVEEEEEE these razors!! Never before have I achieved a smoother shave, and my skin was ridiculously soft after my shower! I highly recommend these!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Venus wins again
customer_reviews.text: Excellent razor. I have tried so many different cheaper razors but I always end up coming back to Venus. And this new Swirl Venus is the best one yet. I wish they had more coupons because they can get very pricey but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TheRealJJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this razor
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor! So easy to use, and just as it's advertised it makes shaving the curves and contours of your body much easier! No more razor knicks on my knees or ankles, which is awesome. The five blades are very nice too, but I like that with the razor handle you are able to use any variety of the Venus razor replacement blades. I would recommend this razor to anyone who shaves!
customer_reviews.author: Lizalu

customer_reviews.title: Love the improvements
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these razor through all of the transitions. I like the newer none slim version the best.
customer_reviews.author: nina pina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face. It works so well. I get a lot of shave before I replace it. The blade just glides so softly around my facial curves. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the swivel head, moves with the curves of your body
customer_reviews.author: Kapricia jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic four shaving everything except the face. I love it
customer_reviews.author: pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: I honestly expected a little more from the swivel but it gets the job done and does make shaving around my ankles, knees and pits easier.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn's Workshop

customer_reviews.title: Venus quality says it all. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Not only pretty but has 5 blades and gets skin silky smooth. Comes with extra cartridge at a low pricep
customer_reviews.author: LISA L SMITH

customer_reviews.title: I like this razor
customer_reviews.text: Just needed to replace my precious razor. I like this razor, it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Iggynw

customer_reviews.title: I've tried all kinds of razors on the market but ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all kinds of razors on the market but I keep coming back to this one. I've never had a closer or smoother shave with any other razor
customer_reviews.author: The Gibleedoos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it thinking about buying more put on subscribe or something.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have a sensitive skin and this razor didn’t do anything good. It fact it made my ingrows look even more noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Nour Bachir

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor
customer_reviews.text: Shaves my legs nicely. It is also a pretty color. It's a razor. It does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Third time buying these as they’re the best razors I’ve had in my life. They glide smoothly and last at least eight months at a time. Good investment long term as they’re a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Evanoff

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor!!! Best one ever made! Fast and quick transaction thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lyons-Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and clean
customer_reviews.text: It felt smoother than butta! I was able to shave quickly and so close, I almost forgot I was shaving. No knicks, no razor burn, and so far no ingrown hairs. I've always been a fan of Venus, but this is above and beyond :)
customer_reviews.author: B. Brody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only razor I’ve used that easily shaves under my arms. With others, I’d always miss some hair. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: am24

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I expected but I like it none the less. I'll be trying a different one next time. I've always used Venus razors and have yet to find a favorite one.
customer_reviews.author: Lanela

customer_reviews.title: the five blades are indeed smoother and make shaving feel like nothing. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Having a pleasant experience with this razor: the five blades are indeed smoother and make shaving feel like nothing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: cici

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Product was so great I bought a second time. Does not dry legs out and is easy to use. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Package 1 of 2 came damaged /open
customer_reviews.text: Cant use one of the 2 i ordered for fear of tampering. Package arrived opened.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Commerford

customer_reviews.title: good razor not good for travel
customer_reviews.text: not great to travel with as the soap around the razor sticks to everything!! good razor though!!
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: and so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this razor for the past month, and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: ejr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Second time buying a swirl. The first one broke after 5 years of use!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good razor!
customer_reviews.text: The head is a bit large, but overall it's a really nice razor.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Love these razors
customer_reviews.text: Purchased through Amazon as part of a salel but I regularly use these from the store. Love these razors!
customer_reviews.author: NVanD

customer_reviews.title: Great razor! It really moves with your curves so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great razor! It really moves with your curves so it doesn't nick. I am very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Meganmh

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing! I love the design makes it so much ...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! I love the design makes it so much easier to not cut around your knees. My new favorite razor!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best razor I've ever had. The second best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: T. Buskohl

customer_reviews.title: Great razor!
customer_reviews.text: Love these razors! Very safe as well as functioning well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S. Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Buying these for her; makes me happy
customer_reviews.text: This is my Wife's everyday driver. And I must say; he legs have never been smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shave
customer_reviews.text: Great set of razors for shaving my head. Smooth cutting
customer_reviews.author: brandon birtch

customer_reviews.title: Best Bald Head Shaver for Men
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy who's used a Venus razor to shave my head for years, and this is a nice improvement on a good design. A main benefit of the Venus blade design is to shave shin-bone and ankle areas without taking a skin sample. And likewise it shaves smoothly across my scalp without the scrapes I was getting from otherwise great blades designed for shaving a face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time in great condition and the product itself worked great! and I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Porter

customer_reviews.title: Worst
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Gillette Venus razor. But I don’t like Gillette Venus Swirl with the flex ball
customer_reviews.author: Melike T. Acar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: best razor I've ever used, just wish it were less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: nicolee c.

customer_reviews.title: Not just a gimmick
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, close shave. Has converted me from Schick Hydro Silk. No nicks and the blades last.
customer_reviews.author: LovesFlats

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic razor.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly better than my older version of Venus! I was quite pleased and surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moss

customer_reviews.title: Just like Venus.....
customer_reviews.text: If you have the Venus razor, you have this one, not enough difference to purchase this one too.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Quilter

customer_reviews.title: Good One
customer_reviews.text: It's great as far as razors go. The handle is slightly too big, but I'm getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: ManyHummingbirds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good razor though I don't feel like the shiny ball makes my shave any better.
customer_reviews.author: ER Nurse

customer_reviews.title: ... long time since I found a razor that I love and this one has me loving it
customer_reviews.text: It's been a long time since I found a razor that I love and this one has me loving it. I like the swirl head it gives it enough swivel to contour with your body and not too much were it can cut you if slipped
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: buy this!
customer_reviews.text: same flex-ball technology as the men's fusion. no cuts/great for curves!
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE WAYNE

customer_reviews.title: my legs love you
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful razor - you can do a quick job with no knicks.
customer_reviews.author: susan bieniek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves this thing, but the refills are outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: Stormtower120

customer_reviews.title: Best ever women's razor. Like, ever.
customer_reviews.text: This really is the best razor for women in the history of the world.!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Brown

customer_reviews.title: The Gillette Venus Swirl Women's Razor did not come with ...
customer_reviews.text: The Gillette Venus Swirl Women's Razor did not come with a razor head. It only came with the two cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife, who easily gets razor burn, and she loves them! We will be repeat purchasers. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Love Venus razors
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Venus razors since middle school and they are still the best! This one is no exception and provides a smooth, comfortable, low-risk (no cuts!) shave. The razor is high quality and has stayed sharp over time. I like the 5 blade razors the best. I haven't noticed a huge difference because of the flexiball compared to other Venus razors I've used, but it certainly doesn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: jjbanana

customer_reviews.title: Your search for the best razor is over!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best razor I've ever had!!! It shaves so close and leaves my skin feeling so soft and silky. I highly recommend it! Not one little cut.
customer_reviews.author: drew terry

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Does not have a clean cut. The "gel" drips onto the tub and sticks to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dy

customer_reviews.title: Not as cool as the commercial say
customer_reviews.text: Not as cool as the commercial say. The rollerball doesn't glide evenly. In fact I have used Venus for years and this seemed like the other but with added chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Khan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The design is great but the razor blades are horrible. Definetly not up to venus standards with the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of these razors. I can't get a close shave with them
customer_reviews.author: melissa w.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I felt the swirl was no different from the regular venus.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not So Great
customer_reviews.text: I think this works good for shaving legs. It leaves my legs nice and smooth. Other body parts, underarms etc., it seems to drag, doesn't navigate well around curves. I ended up with stinging and irritation after giving it a try. So now I use two razors, this for my legs and my Quatro for everything else
customer_reviews.author: A. Boleyn

customer_reviews.title: No razor burn
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and I'm prone to razor burn no matter how well I moisturize. This razor allowed me to have a close shave without irritating or cutting my skin. I bought this on Amazon because it was $2 cheaper than the local pharmacy. After years of searching, I finally found a razor that I like.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kolias

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: This broke within 2 days of me using it. The handle fell off the ball. Otherwise I love this razor
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Linder

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!!!
customer_reviews.text: This razor was AWFUL!!! I got razor burn from the very first shave. I thought it was a fluke, but the same thing happened to my friend. Google this razor, sounds like a fairly common problem. I would return it, but i forgot about it when i went on vacation so now I'm stuck with it. I would give it zero stars, but it didn't give me that option.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Silliman

customer_reviews.title: once is use full disappointment set in
customer_reviews.text: I was totally excited about purchasing this razor. However, once is use full disappointment set in. Does not shave close and smooth. Was flexible but not as what was described. Would not waste your money on this one. Please try something else and let me know if you find the "one"!
customer_reviews.author: Allegiance

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My razor fell apart within one year of purchase. So disappointed because I liked the razor and bought one for my daughter too with a bunch of blade replacements...🥺
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Venus is good for not causing razor burn although I don’t feel I get a close enough shave my hair growth is returning faster after I use this compared to other razors, not sure why but it’s a little irritating lol
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor, love the swirl
customer_reviews.text: this is my new fav razor, I thought the swirl was a bit of a gimmick at first, but i have found it's helpful in getting the harder to reach places without having to contort your body as the blade head flexes instead of your body having to adjust to give it room.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: What a great razor, I used it and it shaved nice ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great razor, I used it and it shaved nice and close. The head of the razor swivels so it glides with your legs. It has a nice design in the handle also. It comes with the handle and 2 blades. I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Gillette Venus Extra Smooth Swirl Women's Razor - 1 Handle + 2 Refills (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Size:1 Razor + 2 RefillsVenus razors for women are designed with a woman’s body in mind. From handles designed for a comfortable grip to pivoting heads that contour to curves, Venus razors are designed to help reveal touchably smooth skin. With 5 individually adjusting Contour blades, the Gillette Venus Extra Smooth Swirl razor blades help capture what other razors may miss. These razor blade refills contain our thinnest & sharpest blades for a close and smooth shave. Did you know that any Venus blade refill fits any Venus razor handle? Shave your way without buying a whole new Venus handle.
feature_bullets: The water-activated RIBBON OF MOISTURE around the blade helps protect from nicks & cuts
FLEXIBALL HANDLE pivots to your body for virtually no missed hairs
All VENUS BLADES FIT all VENUS HANDLES
The pivoting, ROUNDED HEAD HUGS CURVES and fits easily into hard-to-shave areas
MICROFINE COMB guides hair to the blades that capture virtually every hair

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,183 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
